name: Grand Miliunum
title: Grand Millennium Hotel Sulaimani
detail: The Grand Millennium Sulaimani Hotel is a 5-star hotel, offering free WiFi in all areas, spa and fitness facilities, bars and restaurants serving international cuisine. It features an indoor pool.All rooms feature a city and a mountain view. Each one offers a flat-screen TV, a minibar and an en-suite bathroom with a shower and a bath. Some suites include a balcony and a living room.

name: Baz
title: Baz Motel
detail: The Baz Motel is a 3-star motel, offering free WiFi in all areas ,Rooms offers a flat-screen TV, a minibar and an en-suite bathroom with a shower and a bath. Some suites include a balcony and a living room.

name: Gali Ali Bag
title: Gali Ali Bag
detail: Hailed as the highest waterfall in the Middle East, Gali Ali Bag, a dusty but beautiful three-hour drive from Erbil, is a mountain resort located on the intersection of two mountain ranges – the Korek chain in the north and the Bradost chain in the west – and two rivers, the Rawandoz Sidakan and the Khalifan. The breathtaking scenery around the waterfalls has long since assured the site’s popularity as a picnic spot, and the resort today – complete with a waterside souk and its host of terrace cafes and eateries – offers a warm, authentic welcome. During the long summer months, tourists from all over Iraq can be found in these popular waterfalls – famous for their outstanding natural beauty. The dramatic mountain scenery in the second half of the three-hour drive makes the excursion well worth the effort and one of Erbil Lifestyle’s favorite day trip destinations..

name: Majdi Mall
title: Majdi Mall
detail: Majidi Mall Shopping and Entertaining Centre, one of the largest shopping and entertainment Centre’s in Iraq. Opened doors to visitors on 23 November 2009. Visitors have the opportunity to shop in ana acclimatized, hygienic and safe environment combining daylight and the spaciousness of outside streets thanks to its architectural design,which pushes new boundaries in the understanding of the shopping Centre Majidi Mall, as Iraq’s most entertaining shopping Centre of Iraq,Offer its visitors an optimal shopping experience with 67 shops over 3 floors with car parking for 2000 Cars.””The centre is home to 6D Cinema, delicious food and limitless entertainment in Game Land,all in one place under the roof of the Majidi Mall shopping centre,which presents a new way of living.
location: Bakrajo Main Road, 31019 As Sulaymānīyah, Iraq

name: Grand Plaza
title: Grand Plaza Hotel
detail: The Grand Plaza Hotel is a 3-star motel, offering free WiFi in all areas ,Rooms offers a flat-screen TV, a minibar and an en-suite bathroom with a shower and a bath. Some suites include a balcony and a living room.
location: Bakrajo Main Road, 21019 As Sulaymānīyah, Iraq

name: Zamo
title: Zamo Hotel
detail: The Zamo Motel is a 3-star motel, offering free WiFi in all areas ,Rooms offers a flat-screen TV, a minibar and an en-suite bathroom with a shower and a bath. Some suites include a balcony and a living room.

name: Chavi Land
title: Chavi Land
detail: Chavy Land is one of the largest tourist cities in the city of Sulaimaniya and the Kurdistan Region. Chavy Land is built on Goizha mountains (area of approximately 750,000 square meters). It is also the view of the city of Sulaimaniya. The project consists of fifty species of three-dimensional open world games (various open and closed games) in addition to containing telefric, wax museum, cinema, fountains, water, restaurants, shacks tourism, hotels, tourist cabins, social clubs, palaces, green spaces dedicated to sit and rest and several cafeterias and fastfood restaurants.
location: Goizha,Circle of Malik Mahmoud, 31019 As Sulaymānīyah, Iraq

name: Family Mall
title: Family Mall
detail: Darin Group is in partnership with Halabja Group in Family Mall Sulaymaniyah project. Halabja Group has operations in general trading, international transportation, telecommunication and construction industries. Total construction area is 215,500 m2, 100,00 m2 of which will be developed as a recreational park area in partnership with the municipality. Family Mall Sulaymaniyah will cover 104,000 m2 of gross built up area, 60,000 m2 of which will be leasable and will include retail shops, a large hypermarket operated by Carrefour, food court, cafes and VIP restaurants with the park view, ice skating, bowling, fitness center and indoor game areas and offices. A rectangular shaped shopping gallery is connected to a central atrium with a glass dome roof. The atrium creates a visual connection between the shopping levels and brings natural light into the internal shopping corridors.
location: Baban St ,Circle of Malik Mahmoud, 45019 As Sulaymānīyah, Iraq

name: Erbil International Hotel
title: Erbil International Hotel
detail: Offering an indoor pool and a restaurant, Erbil Quartz Hotel is located in Erbil. Free WiFi access is available in all areas. Each room here will provide you with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a minibar. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a bath and a hairdryer. You can enjoy city view from the room. Extras include satellite channels and cable channels.

title: Erbil View Motel

location: 30 Street, near the Council of Ministers, 44001 Erbil, Iraq

name: Shnglbana
title: Shnglbana
detail: Shinglbana is found only in five countries, including Kurdistan. Shinglbana consists of fifty booths moving on a railway which is 1475 meters long and 300 meters higher than Bekhal fall. They move across Hendren, Korak, Zozig and Bradost mountains. It is 200 meters higher than the last point of the railway. Located in Rawanduz 1:30 hrs driving from Erbil. The booths, move down to the valley 55 kilometers per hour. Through this journey you see Rwandiz Valley, Bechal and Ali Bag fall. You will enjoy the beautiful nature of Kurdistan.
location: Korak, Zozig and Bradost mountains. Erbil, Iraq

name: Majdi Mall
title: Majdi Mall
detail: Majidi Mall Shopping and Entertaining Centre, one of the largest shopping and entertainment Centre’s in Iraq. Opened doors to visitors on 23 November 2009. Visitors have the opportunity to shop in ana acclimatized, hygienic and safe environment combining daylight and the spaciousness of outside streets thanks to its architectural design,which pushes new boundaries in the understanding of the shopping Centre Majidi Mall, as Iraq’s most entertaining shopping Centre of Iraq,Offer its visitors an optimal shopping experience with 67 shops over 3 floors with car parking for 2000 Cars.””The centre is home to 6D Cinema, delicious food and limitless entertainment in Game Land,all in one place under the roof of the Majidi Mall shopping centre,which presents a new way of living.
location: 30 Street, near the Council of Ministers, 44001 Erbil, Iraq

name: Dilshad Palace Hotel
title: Dilshad Palace Hotel
detail: The Dilshad Palace features a swimming pool surrounded by a garden and elegantly decorated rooms and suites. It has a restaurant and a bar, and offers free Wi-Fi and free parking. All the air-conditioned units at the Dilshad Palace come with a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar, an d a safe. Their en suite bathrooms are equipped with bathtubs. The suites have a separate living room. A fresh breakfast is served every morning at the Dilshad. The restaurant serves delicacies from the Kurdish and the Mesopotamian tradition mixed with occidental options. The 24-hour reception can help guests with their visit to the area. Zeri Land Park is a 5-minute drive from the property and the Mazi Mall is a 5-minute walk away. Erbil International Airport is 168 km away.
location: Main Streert / Zakho Way, 42001 Duhok, Iraq

name: Kristal Motel Duhok
title: Kristal Motel Duhok
detail: Located in the centre of Duhok, Kristal Hotel Duhok offers simply furnished accommodations. It offers a fitness centre and a restaurant. Dream City and Mazi Market are 500 m away. All units come with a flat-screen TV, air-conditioning and an electric kettle. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with a bath and a hairdryer. Breakfast is served in the room or at the buffet restaurant. Guests can have an eclectic atmosphere with DJ music for all tastes at the bar and nightclub. Meeting facilities are available upon request. Azadi Park is 1.2 km away and Duhok International Airport is 15 minutes away by car. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Shaqlawa
title: Shaqlawa
detail: A famous resort in Iraqi Kurdistan, situated to the north verdant of sefin Mountain, 966m high from the sea level. It has been visited by tourists since old times because it is a touristic city par excellence and a large part of its citizens make their living from the sector of tourism. It is 51km from Erbil, and the road between them is in good state. It is temperature in summer reaches 30-35C and 10C below in winter. It is rich in trees and gardens. They sell a lot of local products and crops, namely, the fruits that grow in Shaqlawa’s gardens and the neighboring grow regions. It is a typical resort in terms of availability of touristy places and various services; it is probably the ideal tourism city in all Iraq. Restaurants, hotels, casinos, motels, and resorts are numerous in Shaqlawa.

name: Family Mall
title: Family Mall
detail: Opened its doors in Dec 2010 the most modern shopping mall in Iraq with over 130 shops to cater for all customer needs, with the anchor tenant Carrefour, open since Jan 2011. Situated in a prime location on 100m street in the heart of Erbil city center, alongside the Family Fun amusement park the location offers something for all the family. In addition to the Carrefour Superstore one of the top 5 supermarket groups in the world, retailers such as Mango, LCW, DKNY, Timberland, Bossini, Geox, Springfield, US Polo, Defacto, FLO, Koton, Mothercare, Home Istanbul, K.F.C (opening mid 2014), KOREK Telecom and many other international brands have now opened in the mall. Also offering a wide selection of fast food outlets, an attractive feature of this modern shopping complex, popular now with visitors to the mall. Empire Group have opened a 14 screen Multi Plex Cinema an superb attraction for all the family, which has added even more value to the Family Mall shopping experience. Such is the success of Family Mall Erbil that work has now started on a 12,000m2 extension to the mall, to cater for more international brands requiring shop units, as they see the growing potential of retail shopping in Erbil New Family Mall`s locations are under construction in both Suliamania and Dohuk, two Kurdistan cities that like Erbil are fast developing and in need of modern shopping malls. The two new shopping malls are planned to open in 2015, managed and leased by Jones Lang LaSalle on behalf of Darin Group, bringing their years of shopping mall management to Iraq Kurdistan.
location: Barzani main road City Center, Barzani main road, Dihok 42001, 42001 Duhok, Iraq
